title: `yarn flow` stuck at merging
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**
A bug
**What is the current behavior?**
I followed the contributing guide,cloned the react repository,ran `yarn` and then `yarn flow dom` at the root directory.However it stuck at merging.
What's more flow took up more and more memory as time went by.
Iâ€™ve waited for more than an hour,should i continue waiting?

**My environment**:  Win10,64bit    yarn:v1.12.3    flow-bin:v0.72.0
**Command line Info**:
$yarn flow dom
yarn run v1.12.3
$ node ./scripts/tasks/flow.js dom
Running Flow on the dom renderer...
Launching Flow server for E:\react\scripts\flow\dom
Spawned flow server (pid=14876)
Logs will go to C:\Users\44219\AppData\Local\Temp\flow\EzCzBreactzBscriptszBflowzBdom.log
Monitor logs will go to C:\Users\44219\AppData\Local\Temp\flow\EzCzBreactzBscriptszBflowzBdom.monitor_log
Please wait. Server is initializing (merged files 333/342 (97.4%))

**Log file:**
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.365] argv=E:\react\node_modules\flow-bin\flow-win64-v0.72.0\flow.exe start --temp-dir C:\Users\44219\AppData\Local\Temp\flow E:\react\scripts\flow\dom-browser
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.387] Watching paths: 
	E:\react\node_modules\
	E:\react\packages\
	E:\react\scripts\
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.408] Initializing Server (This might take some time)
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.408] executable=E:\react\node_modules\flow-bin\flow-win64-v0.72.0\flow.exe
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.408] version=0.72.0
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.412] Parsing
[2019-01-02 17:05:06.903] File E:\react\node_modules\art\parsers\svg\text.js is malformed
[2019-01-02 17:05:14.154] Building package heap
[2019-01-02 17:05:14.218] Loading libraries
[2019-01-02 17:05:15.216] Resolving dependencies
[2019-01-02 17:05:21.037] to_merge: Focused: 235, Dependents: 0, Dependencies: 105
[2019-01-02 17:05:21.037] Calculating dependencies
[2019-01-02 17:05:21.346] Merging


When i run `yarn flow` on other projects,flow works well.

**Which versions of React, and which browser / OS are affected by this issue? Did this work in previous versions of React?**
React:v16.6.1   Win10,64bit    yarn:v1.12.3    flow-bin:v0.72.0
